animals.name: Tiger
animals.hint: A large striped cat found in Asia.

animals.name: Giraffe
animals.hint: The tallest animal, known for its long neck.

animals.name: Zebra
animals.hint: Known for its black and white stripes.

animals.name: Kangaroo
animals.hint: A marsupial that hops and is native to Australia.

animals.name: Panda
animals.hint: A black and white bear that primarily eats bamboo.

animals.name: Eagle
animals.hint: A bird of prey known for its keen eyesight.

animals.name: Shark
animals.hint: A large fish known for its sharp teeth.

animals.name: Penguin
animals.hint: A flightless bird that lives in cold regions.

animals.name: Buffalo
animals.hint: A large, strong animal often found in herds.

animals.name: Flamingo
animals.hint: A pink bird known for standing on one leg.

animals.name: Koala
animals.hint: A tree-dwelling marsupial native to Australia.
